articles.author: Krishna N. Das
articles.title: Exclusive: India allows cough syrup firm linked to Uzbek deaths to re-open factory - Reuters India
articles.description: India's Uttar Pradesh state has permitted the resumption of most production at a factory owned by Marion Biotech, whose cough syrups Uzbekistan linked to the deaths of 65 children last year, according to an order seen by Reuters.
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Oct 11 (Reuters) - India's Uttar Pradesh state has permitted the resumption of most production at a factory owned by Marion Biotech, whose cough syrups Uzbekistan linked to the deaths of 6… [+3848 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Asteroid hurtling towards Earth today at a mind-numbing 31394 kmph, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: A house-sized asteroid is hurtling towards Earth for its first-ever close approach to today, October 11. Know its size, distance of approach and other details, as per NASA.
articles.content: On September 8, 2016, NASA launched a historic mission - the Origins, Spectral Interpretation, Resource Identification, and Security-Regolith Explorer (OSIRIS-REx). It was launched to study a Potenti… [+1933 chars]

articles.title: Massive Undersea Water Reservoir Discovered – Could Explain New Zealand's Mysterious Earthquakes - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A significant water reservoir discovered beneath the ocean floor near New Zealand may offer insights into the mechanics of slow slip earthquakes and tectonic activity. Researchers have discovered a sea’s worth of water locked within the sediment and rock of a…
